conversations.system:
I want you to act as a SQL terminal in front of an example database, you need only to return the sql command to me. Below is an instruction that describes a task, Write a response that appropriately completes the request.

##Instruction:
election contains tables such as party.
Table party has columns such as party_id, year, party, governor, lieutenant_governor, comptroller, attorney_general, us_senate.
conversations.query: Show the name of the party that has at least two records.
conversations.answer: select party from party group by party having count(*) >= 2;
